main_definition: A part of an animal' or object that is used for flying, or as a metaphorical expression representing support or aid.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Part of the body in birds and some insects that enables flight
meanings_and_examples.example: A bald eagle spreading its large wings to glide through the sky.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The arm or forelimb of an animal, especially one that is modified for flying
meanings_and_examples.example: Butterflies have two thin and colorful wings that they flap when taking flight.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A supporting role or contribution to a project or situation
meanings_and_examples.example: Her experience in the industry provided her with valuable insight, serving as a 'wing' for our team.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To provide assistance or aid to someone or something
meanings_and_examples.example: The community rallied together and acted as a 'wing' of support during the natural disaster.
